name: Data Volume Consistency
description: Data volumes must be consistent across time periods unless explicitly accounted for
message: Data volume variance detected. Verify if legitimate or investigate data quality issues

name: Latency vs Cost Trade-off
description: Real-time data pipelines have higher costs than batch pipelines
message: Cannot achieve real-time latency with cost-sensitive requirements. Choose either lower latency or lower cost

name: Schema Governance Requirements
description: Strict data governance requires predefined schemas
message: Schemaless storage conflicts with strict governance requirements. Implement schema validation

name: Retention Policy Compliance
description: Retention policies must align with compliance requirements
message: Data retention period is shorter than compliance requirements

name: Scalability Planning
description: Architecture must support projected data growth
message: High growth rate requires auto-scaling infrastructure

name: Integration Complexity
description: Too many integration patterns increases operational complexity
message: Consider consolidating integration patterns to reduce complexity
